about.title: About me
about.desc: I am a graduate of the Degree in Computer Engineering at UPV University. I consider myself a person who likes to learn new things every day and who likes challenges to overcome and develop. If you want to see my more technical profile you can download my resume here below. In my free time I like to exercise, especially at the gym and in the mountains. I also like to read historical and mystery novels.
about.bookDesc: The Truth About the Harry Quebert Affair

learning.title: Now Learning...
learning.desc: I am a person who likes to learn new things every day, currently I am focused on the following subjects:

item1.desc: Fullstack developer using PHP for backend MySQL database and React and jQuery for the frontend.

item2.desc: Software developer, I used C++ and Python for programming scanners that detects fruit and vegetables defects.

item3.desc: Frontend developer, using Angular with Typescript for develop a modern web application for a bank.

item4.desc: Frontend developer using React with TypeScript and testing with Jest. Creating a NFT Marketplace for DC COMIC in the Palm Blockchain.
